name: sliminess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or fact of being covered in slime (= a sticky liquid substance ): Any sliminess on the surface means the mushrooms are not fresh. He had to cross the wet rocks, and he felt their sliminess through the soles of his boots.
disapproving the quality of being friendly but in a way that people find unpleasant or dishonest: He was an expert at clever sliminess and deceit. Despite his sliminess, Patricia believed him. See
slimy
More examplesFewer examplesAvoid airtight plastic bags as this encourages sliminess.It was hard to keep safe footing upon the sliminess.During the war, his sliminess helped him change sides and erase his past.
